name: Subform
short_description: Repeating sets of nested form fields.

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the parameter

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties3.name: layout
properties3.description: (mandatory) The layout for the repeatable table.

properties4.name: component
properties4.description: (optional) To change the component where it should search for layout

properties5.name: client
properties5.description: (optional) Function to initialise the application clientFrontend: site or 0Backend: admin or 1

properties7.name: buttons
properties7.description: (optional) Which buttons to show if multiple mode is true.Options: add,remove,move

properties8.name: fields
properties8.description: (mandatory) The fields to add to the modal. All fields must first be created in component builder as a field before you can add them here, since you must use the id of the field. Separate the field ids/guids with commas. Do not add custom fields that are not also used in this component.

properties9.name: formsource
properties9.description: (optional) you can add a path to a xml file containing the fields.

properties10.name: description
properties10.description: (optional) (translatable) description text for the form field. Displays at the top of the modal with the name as well as in the usual position in the form

properties11.name: default
properties11.description: (optional) The default value for the form field if the field is left empty. Note this has to be a json string compatible with the contents of the form field.

properties12.name: icon
properties12.description: (optional) The icon to show on the select button (is prefixed with "icon-").

properties13.name: max
properties13.description: (optional) The maximum number of rows of fields allowed (by default 999 to be effectively infinite)

properties14.name: min
properties14.description: (optional) The minimum number of rows of fields required

properties15.name: filter
properties15.description: (optional) Use only if you would like to save raw data, since the default is best.

properties16.name: showon
properties16.description: (optional) show this field on the bases of the value in another field. https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: Provides a form containing repeatable rows of nested fields that you define. Users can add as many entries as needed, with each row replicating the specified field structure. This field type relies on a jQuery-based JavaScript file to handle dynamic behaviour and is ideal for managing structured, multi-value input.
